title: Gamification Workshop for Technical Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Fundamental Understanding of Document Preparation
context.additional_context: Short-term gamified program for current practitioners to enhance scientific technical writing skills, combining smartphone-based activities and offline workshops in a blended learning format

learning_goals: Learners can apply the standard structure of science lab reports (introduction-methods-results-discussion) with 80% accuracy
Learners can peer-edit technical documents using a 5-point rubric that evaluates clarity and accuracy.
Learners can compose three or more types of scientific technical documents (lab reports, equipment manuals, research proposals) through gamified missions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
